resources.string: "Connects with the last time connected server automatically."
"The clipboard data on PC is reflected to your smart phone."
"Sends anonymous usage statistics to elp us improve this app.No personal content or information is sent."
"Scanning Server.\nIf not found, add server ip address"
"The input character was transmitted to PC."

"Push a top button to display character input area and key-buttons.
Tap with one finger to left-click.
Tap with two fingers to right-click.
Tap and drag with one finger to drag.
Drag with two fingers or drag right edge to scroll.
Hint is displayed according to the number of the touched fingers."

"Tap with 2nd finger to left-click.
Tap with 2nd and 3rd fingers to right-click.
Drag with the 2nd finger touched to left-drag.
Drag with the 2nd and 3rd fingers touched to right-drag."
"Pinching to zoom.\nDrag with two fingers to scroll."

"Tap with three fingers to copy selected characters.
Double tap with three fingers to search selected characters with a browser.
Using three fingers, brush up or down to maximize or minimize the window.
Using three fingers, brush left and right to page forward and back."

"Tap with four fingers to minimizes all open windows and displays the desktop.(Win)\nUsing four fingers, brush left and right to switch to another window.\nUsing four fingers, brush up and down to switch to another window.(Win Aero)"
"Drag to left and right to switch to another window."
"Drag to up and down to switch to another window.(Win Aero)"
"After input characters.Click decision button to send it to PC.\nPush a back key to hide character input area and key-buttons."
